::Hunter::

"Slag you!" Hunter yells, flying backwards as the Cyber Bee opens 
fire on him. He fires several optic blasts at it and brings his arms 
up to shield himself from it's attacks.






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Scorponok quickly pulls back behind the rock opening his left claw 
showing
> his cyber bee inside. "How in the Slag should I know, i've only been
> operational for a few megacycle. Now if youll excuse me." He fires 
his
> cyber bee which heads straight up from the rock pillar. "I got 
places to
> go" he yells and starts on a mad dash away, while his cyber bee 
opens fire
> on this crazy bot.
